SELECT C.seq, C.car_num, C.year, C.passenger, C.trunk, C.door, C.kmpl, C.price, C.img1, C.img2, C.img3, C.gen_date, C.upt_date, C.cmpn_seq, B.name AS brand, S.name AS segment, COL.name AS color, F.name AS fuel, M.name AS mission, STATUS.name AS status, MC.name AS model_name, MC.img AS model_img, TC.name AS trim_name, CM.name AS cmpn_name, CM.postal AS cmpn_postal, CM.addr1 AS cmpn_addr1, CM.addr2 AS cmpn_addr2, CM.tel AS cmpn_tel, CO.opt_code AS co_opt_code, IO.opt_code AS io_opt_code, IO.price AS io_price FROM (SELECT * FROM car WHERE seq = #{seq} ) C LEFT OUTER JOIN code_sub B ON C.brand = B.code LEFT OUTER JOIN code_sub S ON C.segment = S.code LEFT OUTER JOIN code_sub COL ON C.color = COL.code LEFT OUTER JOIN code_sub F ON C.fuel = F.code LEFT OUTER JOIN code_sub M ON C.mission = M.code LEFT OUTER JOIN code_sub STATUS ON C.status = STATUS.code LEFT OUTER JOIN model_code MC ON C.model = MC.code LEFT OUTER JOIN trim_code TC ON C.trim = TC.code LEFT OUTER JOIN company CM ON C.cmpn_seq = CM.seq LEFT OUTER JOIN car_option CO ON C.seq = CO.car_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN insurance_option IO ON C.seq = IO.car_seq
